price: 97. They said: "Build for him a building (it is said that the building was like a furnace) and throw him into the blazing fire!"
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
